DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine repeatability reproducibility Cirrus HD-OCT measurement illumination area retinal pigment epithelium ( RPE ) .
DOC.brief_title: Repeatability Reproducibility Cirrus HD-OCT Measurements Illumination Areas Under Retinal Pigment Epithelium
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single site study . Ocular history examination conduct consented subject determine participation study . The study divide two phase . In Phase 1 , inter-device variability Cirrus HD-OCT measurement illumination area RPE determine . In Phase 2 , inter-operator variability Cirrus HD-OCT measurement illumination area RPE determine . In phase , Macular Cube 200 x 200 scan Macular Cube 512 x 128 scan evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Males females 50 year age old diagnose advanced dry AMD geographic atrophy . Geographic atrophy lesion : Not great 5 mm wide diameter . The entire lesion ( ) fit 6x6 mm scan area Cirrus HDOCT . Not small 1.25 mm2 . Not confluent peripapillary atrophy . Not combined lesion CNV . Able willing make require study visit . Able willing give consent follow study instruction . History retinal surgery , laser photocoagulation , and/or radiation therapy eye . Evidence retinal disease eye , include wet AMD , diabetic retinopathy , diabetic macular edema , significant vitreomacular traction . Thick medium opacity inability fixate precludes obtain acceptable scan . Concomitant use hydrochloroquine chloroquine . Unable make require study visit . Unable give consent follow study instruction .
